scripts.build:
vite build; echo '

Did you mean to run build-script?

'
scripts.build-android: npx cap build --androidreleasetype APK --keystorepath ../debug.keystore --keystorepass android --keystorealias androiddebugkey --keystorealiaspass android android; chmod 0777 ./android -R
scripts.build-app: npm run build; npx capacitor-assets generate; npx cap sync; chmod . 0777 -R;
